title: Identify a Product Niche and Source Products
description: Research and identify a niche product with good demand and reasonable competition. Decide whether to source products from local suppliers, import, or create your own (e.g., handicrafts, custom apparel).
qualifications: A selected product or product line

title: Choose a Platform and Set Up Your Store
description: Decide where to sell. You can start on a marketplace like Daraz for easy entry, or create your own branded store using a platform like Shopify for more control. Set up your store with high-quality product photos, descriptions, and payment gateways.

title: Launch, Market, and Fulfill First Orders
description: Launch your store and focus heavily on marketing to drive your first sales. Use social media marketing, especially Meta (Facebook/Instagram) Ads, to reach your target audience. Efficiently manage packaging and shipping to ensure good customer experience.
institutes: Working with local courier services (e.g., Koombiyo, PromptXpress)

title: Optimize and Scale Your Business
description: Analyze your sales data to understand what's working. Optimize your marketing campaigns for better ROI. Improve your website for higher conversion rates. Look for ways to expand your product line and increase your average order value.

title: Build a Brand and Expand Channels
description: Transition from just selling products to building a recognized brand. Invest in branding, content marketing, and community building. Expand to other sales channels, such as physical retail partnerships or exporting to international markets.
qualifications: An established brand with a loyal customer base
